definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: Most software systems consist of several concerns that crosscut multiple modules.
sentences.chinese: 大多數軟件系統由一些橫切多個模塊的關注點組成。

sentences.english: Results There are obvious microscopic characteristics to identify on the transverse section of the stem and leaf epidermis of Drymaria cordata.
sentences.chinese: 結果荷蓮豆莖橫切面及葉表皮細胞有明顯的顯微特徵。

sentences.english: Cross section of the cell show that the internal photo synthetic membrane are present as cycloid plica spiralis shape.
sentences.chinese: 細胞橫切面顯示內光合膜系統呈環形復瓦狀結構。
但是橫切行爲會怎麼樣呢？

sentences.english: It also provides a convenient whole-system view of the program's crosscutting structure.
sentences.chinese: 它還對程序的橫切結構提供了方便的完整系統顯示。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of bilateral orchidectomy using transverse incision in front of pubic symphysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討恥骨聯合前橫切口行雙側睾丸切除術的療效。

sentences.english: Methods Comparatively observe the tissue structure of transections of the 4 stems in microscope.
sentences.chinese: 方法光鏡下比較觀察莖橫切面組織構造。

sentences.english: The article describes the design and calculation of air-cushion piler at the rear end of the cross-cut shear in cold rolling mills.
sentences.chinese: 簡要介紹冷軋機橫切機組尾部氣墊垛板的設計計算。

sentences.english: Behavior that crosscuts a number of classes poses a particular problem for integration tests.
sentences.chinese: 橫切數個類的行爲給集成測試帶來了一個特定問題。

sentences.english: So how do we implement a cross-cutting concern such as logging?
sentences.chinese: 因此，怎樣才能實現一個橫切關注點，例如日誌？

sentences.english: It is suitable for a wide range of applications, including thin crosscuts and materials with thin-walled cross sections.
sentences.chinese: 它適用於廣泛的應用，包括薄橫切和薄壁切面的材料。

sentences.english: We're gonna transect the great arteries at the sino-tubular ridge.
sentences.chinese: 我們要在竇管脊上橫切大動脈。

sentences.english: Avoided tying all code to particular instances of cross-cutting concern classes.
sentences.chinese: 避免將所有代碼與橫切關注點類的特殊實例聯繫起來。

sentences.english: The mouth of pants bag should replace transversely line as far as possible with straight-cut line or inclined tangent.
sentences.chinese: 褲袋的開口應儘量以縱切線或斜切線來代替橫切線。

sentences.english: All are examples of what are called crosscutting concerns.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些都是所謂橫切關注點的例子。

sentences.english: An aspect represents a unit of well-modularized crosscutting structure.
sentences.chinese: 方面代表一套模塊化良好的橫切結構。
